Text: OnePass Update Earn Bonus MilesGreat Opportunity to Earn OnePass Bonus Miles Continental Airlines is proud of its partnership with CSFBdirect the onlin e investment firm that combines over years experience of DLJdirect with the global resources of Credit Suisse First Boston one of the worlds largest and most respected investment banks As a OnePass member you will receive OnePass Bonus Miles when you open a new CSFBdirect account with a minimum deposit or transfer of To learn more about this exciting offer visit wwwcsfbdirectcominvestmil es Goodnight Sleep Tight Youll Earn OnePass Bonus Miles Each Night As a Continental OnePass member when you register for MilesByNightSM you earn bonus miles every night you stay at participating hotels durin g March and April in addition to the bonus miles you usually earn per stay The MilesByNight bonus is available at more than participating Westin Hotels Resorts cSheraton Hotels Resorts c St Regis c The Luxury Collection c and W Hotels c in the US Whats more when you stay at any of our nine New York City Manhattan hotels youll receive bonus miles instead of Theres no limit to the bonus miles you can earn during this promotion You must register for MilesByNight to earn OnePass bonus miles Just clic k the link below for more information and to register Start earning tonight mbnmmcomalemco UNFORTUNATELY MAIL SENT TO THIS ADDRESS CANNOT BE ANSWERED PLEASE DIRECT ALL INQUIRIES TO OAIRCOM Note To modify your OnePass email preferences please login to Your Account at wwwonepasscomyouraccount To unsubscribe from all OnePass partner email programs please visit wwwonepasscomemailpartoffers IMAGE
